Moving through the skies like some unseen wind, the minions sweep 
passed R=
elay virtually unseen. (OOC: Except for that one Autobot!) 
They are silent=
 predators intent on some scent that has caught their 
fancy. Their hulls c=
rafted from an enhanced alloy, sensor beams and 
tracking gear pass around =
them as if they weren't there. Their 
numbers are large, enough even to all=
ow them to hide a few who do not 
seem to posses this ability!

For a momen=
t they slowed as they moved neared an island, the sweeps 
twisting and turn=
ing in a complex holding pattern of a sort, far out 
of range of the casual=
 observer.

"Nightstrike, Darkfate!" Scourge's gruff voice transmitted over=
 a 
point to point communication link as he apprached them, seeming to 
alm=
ost materialize out of the host of sweeps that surrounded them. 

"Cyclonus=
 has ordered that you report to Deepstryke. His team may 
have need of your=
 added fire power." Scourge paused obviously eyeing 
the duo derisively, bu=
t then continued, "They are on the island 
below, at these co-ordinates." 
=

They host of sweeps circled a small island some distance from 
Atlantis, t=
he co-ordinates given match the area of the highest 
mountain peak.

Presto=
n
(Da'minion)
